lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur goalkeeper Hugo Lloris has urged his team mates to forget the disappointment of missing out on the Premier League title and predicted a bright future for a squad that is brimming with young talent.

headline.print_headline: Lloris Predicts Bright Future for Spurs
headline.main: Lloris Predicts Bright Future for Spurs
